meanings.definition: The quality or state of having unlimited power or authority.
meanings.sent1: In the story, the king's almightiness was evident in his ability to command the entire kingdom.
meanings.sent2: The belief in the almightiness of the gods was central to the ancient civilization's faith.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's almightiness made even the villains tremble in fear.
meanings.sent4: Her almightiness in the field of science was compared to a shining beacon of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The almightiness of nature's forces was displayed in the powerful storm that swept through the town.

meanings.sent1: The wizard's almightiness was unmatched as he cast spells with ease.
meanings.sent2: The belief in the almightiness of the ancient deity was deeply ingrained in the culture.
meanings.sent3: The cat's almightiness over the household was evident as it lounged on the couch all day.
meanings.sent4: The almightiness of the ocean's waves reminded him of the vastness of nature's power.
meanings.sent5: The almightiness of a parent's love knows no bounds.
